ValidationRule.description: [VR Caso] No se pueden editar los casos cerrados o combinados
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
OR(
RecordType.DeveloperName == "OCSInquiry"&&
( NOT( OR(ISCHANGED(AccountId),ISCHANGED(PolicyId__c),ISCHANGED(MediatedCustomer__c),ISCHANGED(OfferId__c),ISCHANGED(ClaimId__c))))&&
IsClosed &&
$Profile.Id <> '00e5I000000Hu97' &&
$Profile.Id <> '00e5I000000UPld' &&
$Profile.Id <> '00e5I000000QeQS'
&& NOT ISCHANGED(Status)
,
RecordType.DeveloperName == "USPInquiry" &&
IsClosed &&
( NOT( OR(ISCHANGED(InteractionStatus__c),ISCHANGED(AccountId),ISCHANGED(PolicyId__c),ISCHANGED(MediatedCustomer__c),ISCHANGED(OfferId__c)))) &&
NOT ISCHANGED(Status) && $Permission.USPTriggerCaseValidationRules
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: [VR Caso] No se pueden editar los casos cerrados o combinados
